message.name: ERR_NO_TASK_DEFINITION_FOUND
message.locale: No task definition found for task with id %1s.

message.name: ERR_NO_FUNCTION_DEFINITION_FOUND
message.locale: Error loading task type %1s.No function definition found for function with id %2n.

message.name: ERR_NO_FUNCTION_FOUND
message.locale: Cannot load work allocation function named %1s because it does not exist or has the wrong signature.

message.name: ERR_SPECIFIC_TARGET_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Error loading task type %1s. Cannot load allocation target id %2n.

message.name: ERR_ALLOCATION_FUNCTION_FAILED
message.locale: Task id %1n assigned to error queue because task allocation function failed with error '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_NO_ACTIVE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE
message.locale: Tasks cannot be assigned as no active organization structure exists for the organization.
Tasks cannot be assigned as no active organisation structure exists for the organisation.

message.name: INF_REALLOCATE_CASE_REVIEW_TASK
message.locale: Case review task reallocated using the allocation function.

message.name: INF_REALLOCATE_CASE_TASK
message.locale: Case task reallocated using the allocation function.

message.name: INF_REALLOCATE_CASE_APPROVAL_TASK
message.locale: Case approval task reallocated using the allocation function.

message.name: INF_REALLOCATE_PARTICIPANT_TASK
message.locale: Participant task reallocated using the allocation function.

message.name: INF_REALLOCATE_TASK_DEADLINE_TASK
message.locale: Task deadline task reallocated using the allocation function.
